info.name: Half-Demon
info.description: 5e Homebrew Template - Inspired by Dante (Devil May Cry)
info.author: Converted by William Burruss

description.p: When a mortal bloodline is tainted with the essence of a powerful demon—whether through a pact, inheritance, or infernal experimentation—the result may be a Half-Demon. Agile, powerful, and often wrestling with their inner nature, Half-Demons walk the line between destruction and redemption.

Type. You are a Fiend in addition to your original type.
Ability Score Increase. Your Dexterity or Strength score increases by 2, and your Charisma increases by 1.
Demonic Resilience. You have resistance to fire damage and nonmagical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage while below half your hit points.
Demonic Surge. Once per short rest, as a bonus action, you enter a transformed state for 1 minute. Gain temporary hit points equal to your level, +10 ft movement, unarmed strikes deal 1d6 + modifier force damage, extra bonus attack per turn. Attacks count as magical at level 11.
Fiendish Legacy. You know one Warlock cantrip (Charisma is your spellcasting stat). At 3rd level, cast Hellish Rebuke (1/LR, 2nd level); at 5th, Misty Step (1/LR).
Agile Devil. Always under feather fall, gain Acrobatics proficiency, and can perform standing jumps as if with a 10-foot running start.
Languages. You can speak, read, and write Common and Infernal.
You have resistance to fire damage and to nonmagical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage while below half your hit points.

sheet.description: Resist fire and nonmagical B/P/S damage while below half HP.

description.p: Once per short rest, you can activate your demonic power for 1 minute as a bonus action. You gain temporary HP equal to your level, +10 feet movement, unarmed strikes deal 1d6 + modifier force damage, and an extra weapon/unarmed bonus attack each turn. At 11th level, attacks count as magical.

sheet.description: Demonic form: temp HP, speed +10, unarmed force dmg, bonus attack. Attacks magical at lvl 11.

description.p: You gain one Warlock cantrip of your choice (Charisma is your spellcasting ability).
At 3rd level, you can cast Hellish Rebuke (2nd level) once per long rest.
At 5th level, you can cast Misty Step once per long rest.

sheet.description: Warlock cantrip (Cha). 1/LR Hellish Rebuke (lvl 3), Misty Step (lvl 5).

description.p: You are always under the effect of feather fall (no reaction required), gain proficiency in Acrobatics, and can make standing jumps as though you had a 10-foot running start.

sheet.description: Feather fall, Acrobatics proficiency, improved standing jumps.
